ComicInfo.Series: Lady Mechanika: The Tablet of Destinies
ComicInfo.Summary:
The grand finale of The Tablet of Destinies! Lady Mechanika attempts a daring rescue of the Professor and Winifred, but there may be more at stake than she realized. What mysterious secret has the Professor uncovered to provoke such extreme measures from the German secret police? And what will Lady Mechanika do when forced to choose between the lives of her friends and the fate of all humankind?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel & Mike Garcia | 1 | B | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 4 | C | Retailer Incentive | Joe Benitez & Martin Montiel | 5 | D | JoeBenitez.com Dia de los Muertos Edition (Limited to 500 copies) | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 6 | E | BlueRainbow Exclusive (Limited to 500 copies) | Dawn McTeigue & Ula Mos | 3 | F | BlueRainbow Exclusive Night Variant (Limited to 100 copies) | Dawn McTeigue & Ula Mos | 2 | G | La Dama Edition (Limited to 500 copies) | Joe Benitez | 7 | W | White Edition (Limited to 250 copies) | Joe Benitez | 8 | Note: Covers are lettered (A-Z) according to JoeBenitez.com.
